programlisting:
namespace := flag.String("n", "", "The namespace for the metric") metricName := flag.String("m", "", "The name of the metric") unit := flag.String("u", "", "The units for the metric") value := flag.Float64("v", 0.0, "The value of the units") dimensionName := flag.String("dn", "", "The name of the dimension") dimensionValue := flag.String("dv", "", "The value of the dimension") flag.Parse()
if *namespace == "" || *metricName == "" ||*unit == "" || *dimensionName == "" || *dimensionValue == "" { fmt.Println("You must supply a namespace, metric name, value, dimension name, and dimension value") return }
